website_summaries.verdict: Gigantic" is the keyword here. Lots of features and a large-sized keyboard make this a good fit for parties.
pros: Keyboard is 17 inches in width and has 24 keys
Features eight musical instruments in all
Has four modes: record, playback, demo, and play
cons: use it on carpeting or tape it down to keep it from sliding

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy - hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Really fun toy my kids love it. They love running ontop of it and sitting down and touching the keys with their hands. The music sounds pretty good and it’s nice that there is volume control.
customer_reviews.author: Erin A. Pile

customer_reviews.title: Great way to share a wonderful experience with your child. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and undamaged. My four year old son loves it and learned to operate it pretty quickly. When I play it with him, we make more noise than music (lol), but we both enjoy it. I feel like Tom Hanks in the move BIG where he played the floor piano in the toy store. My only recommendation to the manufacturer would be the addition of a volume control button. It’s pretty loud, which my son loves, but it would be nice to be able to turn down the volume sometimes. Overall it’s a great value, my 4 year old loves it and no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: K L

customer_reviews.title: Bad Volume Placement
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes this, but not that much. What I don't like about it is that the volume is one of the touch buttons on the mat. I have to put a step stool over it so my three year old doesn't crank it up to max when she's jumping around. The sound should be on the big black box! Maybe it works better for an older child, but if you're a parent of a younger one--put something over the sound buttons and save your ears!
customer_reviews.author: Darkyiel

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as Eid gifts for my nieces & nephew. They loved it! (Sorry parents, it's far from a quiet toy, but it definitely helps tire the little ones out while introducing them to music and dance). Note - advise against children wearing socks while playing with this as the plastic can be slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy - Slice of Sweet Art

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with your feet!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to my Four-year-old goddaughter is a Christmas gift. She was so excited to open it and get started playing. We noticed the volume control was incredibly sensitive and very very loud. I would recommend putting some sort of grippy thing underneath it if you’re putting it on a tile or wood floor. It’s slid around quite a bit. They had a great time, they were jumping all over it and the volume didn’t seem to impact their fun. Us as parents on the other hand.... well... perhaps some tape or something over the speaker would help?
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Despres

customer_reviews.title: great piano!  loud but awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I read a researched a lot of playmat pianos. I am so happy I decided to get this one. It is very BIG, which is so great for multiple children or even one child who loves to dance/make music. Almost all the reviews on this piano said the piano was very loud, and they were correct! With that said, loud toys have never bothered me. I just figure if my kiddos love it, which they do, I love it too!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, this dancing mat is very sturdy and hard to break. Each of the 8 instruments works perfect. The volume can be adjusted and there are different modes to choose, like play, record and demo. Hours of fun for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Xyqin

customer_reviews.title: Fun dance and music
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been fun. We will see how it holds up over time. My kids and I have both danced on it. It is super loud when you turn it on but you can turn it down really low if you want. The guitar sound doesn’t seem to work but fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jacee

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this, and uses it so much it drives my son crazy :-)! Great product
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Anthony

customer_reviews.title: A child's musical delight
customer_reviews.text: The grand kids love making music with their feet. Guaranteed to wear the little buggers down as they attempt to delight you with their musical talent. But a lot of fun watching them try! And it entertains them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids and dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a Christmas present for my grandkids! One of the best gifts ever! My grandkids come over every Sunday. They play with it every weekend. The Dogs love it too lol!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Daddy Bear

customer_reviews.title: great toy. Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, great toy. Hours of fun. Sturdy and good sound
customer_reviews.author: lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Durable, makes music, loude
customer_reviews.text: Loud, lots of sounds. My child stops all over this thing and loves it. Makes noise and sounds when stomped on. If that’s what you or your child is into then buy this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Interlocutor

customer_reviews.title: It hasn’t broken.
customer_reviews.text: Nephew loves it and it’s been a couple months of they little guy running on it and it hasn’t broken. Great for babies just learning to walk and toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a few of these for gifts. They are colorful but not that easy to play a song on.
customer_reviews.author: L. McManus

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this!! The only problem as a parent did you might want to order some earplugs because when they stop playing on it it can get kind of loud and crazy if more than one child was playing on
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: A novelty
customer_reviews.text: So much fun but kids got bored fast. Not sure if it is my kids or the norm. I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber M.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and likely prone to defect or early failure
customer_reviews.text: Cheap materials match the price. Dead after a couple of seconds. Turned it on and the speaker blasted a bunch of static and poor audio quality. My daughter stepped on it about 2 or three times and it screeched terribly and then stopped producing sound. Replaced batteries, same result. Bad product. I wouldn’t purchase again or recommend for other buyers. I will return.
customer_reviews.author: Max Renfro

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my niece
customer_reviews.text: Both my niece and my nephew love it! Seems to work as it should for now.
customer_reviews.author: F. D. Walz Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Mother believes daugher will enjoy it as
customer_reviews.text: forgot to purchase batteries, Mother believes daugher will enjoy it as well
customer_reviews.author: gerrilutz

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for our kids and they LOVE it! The only downside is the volume when first turned on is SUPER loud but it’s easy to turn down.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdmom15

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Santa got this for the grandkids! Keeps them entertained. One is 8 and one is 1 years of age. Can’t wait to see it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi Hackney

customer_reviews.title: Maybe for toddlers, but didn't hold the attention of my 7 year old.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way it was packaged. It seems to be very sturdy. It just didn't not hold my granddaughters attention, and she is quite musical.
customer_reviews.author: ETi

customer_reviews.title: Kids liked it...parents did not. Difficult to store.
customer_reviews.text: Storage is apparently difficult, per their parents. Kids were having fun though!
customer_reviews.author: Charmer167

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kiddos
customer_reviews.text: Works well and the toddler and baby both love it. One issue is that when you turn it on it starts on the highest volume so you immediately want to turn it down each time.
customer_reviews.author: SHANE

customer_reviews.title: LOOOONG battery life, amazingly  the kids wore out before the batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for my granddaughter and it was hit of her party!
customer_reviews.author: TheOldGeeser

customer_reviews.title: Sound isn’t great
customer_reviews.text: The sound on this did not sound good. Wouldn’t recommend it beautiful and fun but could use some better engineering.
customer_reviews.author: Sansan

customer_reviews.title: Niece loved it
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved it! It has volume control but if you want to be that annoying aunt or uncle and get your niece or nephew the loudest toy possible while also annoying the parents, this is the gift to get!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved this and it is easy to use and perfect gift for kids and adults who love to play with their children!
customer_reviews.author: Joann G.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fold and easy to assemble. Quality is decent. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Functional
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks as advertised. My son dont play with it much. Probably due to age (2.5 yrs). Not the makers fault.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Ketron

customer_reviews.title: A fun way to move and make music!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t yet seen them in action on it but I’m told my granddaughters love this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi B

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: still driving my kids crazy, and grand kids love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: easy

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun fun fun! Like all the settings and the sound is great!
customer_reviews.author: LeaC

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: This playmat is perfect except for the placement of the volume button. My girl keep accidentally pressing on it. Other than that - great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great gift. 1 flaw
customer_reviews.text: Great for my daughter if anything I don't like the volume being on the mat not the box but that's being a perfectionist. My little girl LOVES it!! (My neighbors not so much haha!!)
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved it makes her dance. So I'm very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Phil Russell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WORKS LOUD AND STRONG 1 YEAR OLD LOOOVES IT AND HUGE 10 YEAR OLD TAKES ADVANTAGE AS WELL
customer_reviews.author: bianca A

customer_reviews.title: Awesome small kiddo toy
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved it, she is 4 and is wanting to learn jingle bells by Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W.

customer_reviews.title: Musical Creativity
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful children’s toy! It will promote creativity! Excellent built in volume control!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: SUCH A DISAPPOINTMENT! Shows it’s on but doesn’t work! Sick of buying on amazon and being disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I wish I can return it. I emailed the seller and never heard back. It's not as great as it sounds.
customer_reviews.author: GBSan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up. Open the box, add batteries and play. Good quality. Enjoyed by a 2 year old but definitely could be used by older children.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So fun!! Even for a 25 year old 🤣😩
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves jumping on it great buy
customer_reviews.author: ruth

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my goddaughter for her birthday and have had no complaints. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Govekar

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love it and that makes gpa and gma very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Very Happy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work a
customer_reviews.text: Returning. Can only get a few keys to work. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Shoaf

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT
customer_reviews.text: there should be a way to lock the volume so kids don't blast the piano at full volume in the mornings. anything else was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: cristian

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Clear, loud audio but keys are not as responsive as I’d hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love how you can adjust the volume and the sounds ...
customer_reviews.text: this is very large and loud. Love how you can adjust the volume and the sounds are great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for active toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is almost two and can't get enough of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian C

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves this toy. She wants to play with it everyday
customer_reviews.author: ashley griffith

customer_reviews.title: Get steppin
customer_reviews.text: This was a great hit at my great nephew's birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon N.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early, was opened way before christmas, very good would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so it is Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Got a "Greatest Granmoma Ever" from my grandson, so it is Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: minner white

product_meta.title: Joyin Toy 71" Gigantic Keyboard Playmat Piano Play Mat Kids Electronic Music Playmat Colorful Dance Mat-24 Keys with Record, Playback, Demo, Play, Adjustable Vol. Mode
product_meta.description:
SUPER VALUE. 71" Gigantic 24 Touch Sensitive Keys Piano Fun Electronic Keyboard Music Dance Mat. 

 Dancing Mat Comes with 8 Musical Instruments: Saxophone, Violin, Clarinet, Trumpet, Banjo, Xylophone, Guitar. 4 Modes: Record, Playback, Demo, Play. Adjustable Volume, Automatic "Power Off" System. 

 IDEAL For Kids Practice Solo Dancing Skills or Dance with Friends and Family. Perfect Toy for Holidays, Birthday Parties, Family Together Activity. 

 Made of High Quality, Durable Super Strong Vinyl Colorful Mat. Infinitely Fun. Portable, 4 AA Batteries Needed (Not Included). 

CUSTOMER SATISFACTION. Providing a 100% satisfaction experience is our main priority to our customers. Feel free to message us through “contact sellers” if products don't meet your expectations. The celebrations start at JOYIN!
